definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Families and communities share the happiness of gathering together for iftar and prayers.
sentences.chinese: 亲朋好友欢聚一堂，共享斋月晚餐并共同祈祷。

sentences.english: Lucky generous, carry convenience is tasted the friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥大方，携带方便是馈赠亲朋好友之佳品。

sentences.english: Save money on trips by staying with friends or relatives.
sentences.chinese: 出差时住在亲朋好友家可以节省费用。

sentences.english: A few days ago I flew to Anchorage , Alaska to visit friends and relatives and celebrate winter break.
sentences.chinese: 前几天我坐飞机来安克雷其拜访亲朋好友和庆祝寒假。

sentences.english: Master long ago let their own children to invite neighborhood friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 主人老早便让自家的孩子去请邻里亲朋。

sentences.english: So I started contacting family and friend.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我开始跟亲朋好友联系。

sentences.english: The miller had invited all his relatives and acquaintances.
sentences.chinese: 磨坊主邀请了他所有的亲朋好友。

sentences.english: When Grandfather died, Father sent the obituary to friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷去世了，爸爸向亲朋好友发了哀启。

sentences.english: The song is a dying protagonist's farewell to relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌唱出了主人公临终前对亲朋好友的辞别之情。

sentences.english: It is a tradition of Chinese to give hongbao to friends and relatives during Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 春节期间给亲朋好友发红包是中国人的一个传统。

sentences.english: My thoughts and prayers are with the friends and families of those killed and injured.
sentences.chinese: 我背芍者的亲朋战家属暗示慰问，并为他们祈祷。

sentences.english: My friends and relatives want to watch me audition, is this allowed?
sentences.chinese: 我的亲朋好友想来观看选拔赛，可以吗？

sentences.english: Li Yafei says, "The fiducial client that has an in part about is my close friends."
sentences.chinese: 李雅非说，“约有一半的信托客户是我的亲朋好友。

sentences.english: Many friends and family are struggling to persuade, but Liu declined.
sentences.chinese: 很多亲朋好友都苦苦相劝，但小刘谢绝了。

sentences.english: Thanks for all wishes by family and friend.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢多为亲朋戚友的关心于祝福。

sentences.english: Relatives, neighbours and friends during the final send off procession.
sentences.chinese: 邻居既亲朋戚友来送岳母最后一程。

definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
friend from whom you can seek advice
